column4: Is there a way to disable using laptop integrated camera and use USB attached camera?
you should be able to choose in the app that's going to be using the camera
I don't want to have a temporary use with the help of application or such. I want to make permanent change to use USB camera instead of laptop integrated cam
that gets a little complicated. you'd probably have to edit a config file for that to work. can't help you there, sorry.
